entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 gusting to 70 near Haro Strait this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
